item.title: Blocksafe Builds out Gun Safety Blockchain, Will Host Second Crowdsale
item.description:
Blocksafe Builds out Gun Safety Blockchain, Will Host Second Crowdsale

Blocksafe, a blockchain-based system that provides secure access, personal monitoring and control of "smart" guns, will use Lisk sidechain technology to build out its blockchain and will issue a new token for use on that chain called "Trigger" (TRIG). Lisk is a public blockchain platform that provides decentralized blockchain apps.

item.title: Mizuho Bank Dealt Blow in Latest Mt Gox Lawsuit Update - CoinDesk
item.description:
Mizuho Bank Dealt Blow in Latest Mt Gox Lawsuit Update - CoinDesk

A US judge largely denied a bid last week by Mizuho Bank to dismiss charges filed against it in a class action lawsuit tied to the collapse of defunct bitcoin exchange Mt Gox. In a court order dated 26th August, US District Judge Gary Feinerman ruled Mizhuo should face charges related to unjust enrichment and fraudulent concealment in connection with the exchange's failure.

item.title: Test Attack on Krypton, Ethereum Classic Might be Next
item.description:
Test Attack on Krypton, Ethereum Classic Might be Next

Krypton, Ethereum-based network, has recently recovered from a 2-step attack which resulted in a total of 21,465 KR, approximately $3000 USD, being stolen from Bittrex 's wallets. The Krypton team suspects that the attack might have been just a test: attackers might go for other Ethereum-based blockchains such as ETC, for example.

item.title: Ethereum-Competitor Lisk Unveils Roadmap
item.description:
Ethereum-Competitor Lisk Unveils Roadmap

The multi-platform blockchain project Lisk has just released its Also read: This New Zealand Artist Sees the Blockchain Differently developmental roadmap, which will cover five milestones that the team will build over the next few years. The Berlin-based Lisk project (Lisk.io) has been making waves within the cryptocurrency community for being a possible rival of the Ethereum project.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Stop Loss Hit! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Stop Loss Hit! - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening . It's been a rough day to be an intraday bitcoin price trader. In this morning's analysis, we highlighted a pretty tight range and set out some entry rules with which we would get into the markets on any volatility.

item.title: Darknet Marketplaces Move to Prevent Fentanyl Overdose Incidents - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Darknet Marketplaces Move to Prevent Fentanyl Overdose Incidents - NEWSBTC

With rising fentanyl overdose related deaths, darknet marketplaces like AlphaBay and Darknet Heroes League have taken an anti-fentanyl stance. Read more... A drug dealer with a conscience is not something many people are readily willing to come to terms with.

item.title: New Algorithm Manages Bitcoin Price Volatility for Everyday Users
item.description:
New Algorithm Manages Bitcoin Price Volatility for Everyday Users

Bitcoin prices are fun, if you like roller coasters. For traders who see volatility as an opportunity to make money and are willing to accept the risks, this is great. However this volatility presents a risk for long-term investors, fund managers and businesses who use digital currency for day-to-day operations.

item.title: Industry Leaders Reach Agreement on Blockchain Governance
item.description:
Industry Leaders Reach Agreement on Blockchain Governance

Prominent leaders in the blockchain space have formed a new group with the aim of promoting blockchain's use cases, increasing collaboration within the industry and addressing blockchain governance. According to a newly published ten points agreement participants state that despite the blockchain being a decentralized technology: "Like-minded people and groups can self-organize to voice their valuable perspectives, collaborate and solve problems in a bottom-up, multi-stakeholder fashion.

item.title: Unsung.org 'Hacker House' Has Been Robbed - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Unsung.org 'Hacker House' Has Been Robbed - Bitcoin News

"This is a big setback For us," Jason King says in a Facebook post notifying followers of a robbery committed against the Unsung.org "Hacker House." Also read: Ethereum-Competitor Lisk Unveils Roadmap The hacker house of Unsung.org, an application which seeks to deliver unwanted food from local caterers and restaurants to the homeless, powered by bitcoin, was robbed today.
